content: **spiral flower facial scrubbie** this great little stash buster is perfect for adding something handmade and reusable to your self care routine or they make great customizable gifts with your favorite soap the pattern requires basic knowledge of crochet and crochet stitches including chaining working in a magic_ring half_double_crochet double_crochet increasing and working in the back and front loop this pattern is perfect for an adventurous beginner looking to test your skills by working in a spiral and through front and back loops only find the pattern on my website here https //homespunhues com/pattern/flower-facial-scrubbie/ 1 **finished measurements** finished scrubbie measures approximately 3 5 in diameter using a 5 0mm crochet hook and size 4 worsted weight yarn **materials** 40yds / 37m 22g of a durable size 4 worsted weight cotton yarn - i use loops & threads everyday cotton or lily sugar n cream 5 0mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle stitch marker **pattern notes** pattern is written in american standard terms do not join between rounds scrubbie is worked in a spiral you may sell small batch handmade items using this pattern including a link with credit in your product description you may not redistribute or resell this pattern without written consent from the author contact me for pattern licensing information because this is a digital file and will be available instantly for download any refund or cancellation requests are unavailable **for more information** visit the pattern on my website at https //homespunhues com/pattern/flower-facial-scrubbie/ **recommended use** use finger loop to secure scrubbie to your hand during use lather with your favorite soap for an exfoliating wash follow yarn manufacturer s instructions for washing 1 https //homespunhues com/pattern/flower-facial-scrubbie/
